text:
Hi Team,

I have one landing page, a landing page about calculating some financial values and generating the report when clicking the form submission.
When clicking the report button on the page, we are shown a HubSpot form popup and get the input values of user information (email, name, etcâ€¦).

We have configured the auto responder mailer with the download report button. Once the user submitted the form, the mail triggers. The download reports have been saved in the *specific URL*. *Each time different users have done the form submission, the download form will get generated and stored in a specific website link.*

Now I need to send out the report form to unique report to unique users

Issue: How to give the *specific website link as input value in button component in emailer.?*
its solved by personalisation token. {{ personalization_token('contact.website', 'form field') }}

Hello,
I need help regrading the HubSpot email integration.
